TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiView extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 代表用來作為 控制項群組之容器的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是一組容器控制項。The control is a container for a group of controls. 它可讓您定義一群控制項，其中每個控制項包含子控制項。It allows you to define a group of controls, where each control contains child controls. 您的應用程式可以接著呈現特定根據準則，例如查詢字串參數中傳遞的使用者身分識別、 使用者喜好設定和資訊的用戶端的控制項。Your application can then render a specific control to the client based on criteria such as user identity, user preferences, and information passed in a query-string parameter. 您也可以使用精靈建立的控制項。You can also use the control to create wizards. 在此案例中，每個中所包含的控制項控制項代表不同的步驟或在精靈中的頁面。In this scenario, each control contained in a control represents a different step or page in the wizard. 您也應該使用這個控制項來開發行動裝置的多個畫面應用程式。You should also use this control to develop multiple-screen applications for mobile devices. 這個控制項提供相同的功能，與 ASP.NET 行動.NET Framework 1.1 版中的控制項。This control provides the same functionality as the ASP.NET mobile control in .NET Framework version 1.1. 只有一個控制項一次可定義內的現用檢視表為控制項。Only one control at a time can be defined as the active view within a control. 當控制會定義為使用中的檢視，在用戶端會呈現它所包含的子控制項。When a control is defined as the active view, the child controls that it contains are rendered to the client. 您可以使用屬性或方法來定義使用中的檢視。You can use either the property or the method to define the active view. 如果屬性是空的控制項不會呈現給用戶端的任何內容。If the property is empty, the control does not render any content to the client. 如果設定為使用中的檢視，不存在於控制項，就會引發在執行階段。If the active view is set to a that does not exist within the control, an is raised at run time. 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，您可以定義使用中的檢視。You can define the active view declaratively or programmatically. 設定屬性以宣告方式定義時控制原因轉譯為用戶端第一次設定為使用中的檢視控制項稱為控制項。Setting the property declaratively when you define the control causes the control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the control is called. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性以宣告方式。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property declaratively. ``` ``` 設定屬性以程式設計的方式，或呼叫方法，可讓應用程式，來判斷哪一個控制項呈現給用戶端在執行階段會根據使用者的身分識別或喜好設定等準則。Setting the property programmatically, or calling the method, allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or preferences. 若要允許使用者之間瀏覽控制項都控制項，您可以新增或控制每個控制項。To allow users to navigate between controls within a control, you can add a or control to each control. 善用控制項的自動更新目前現用，將`CommandName`屬性上的按鈕或連結按鈕，以其中一個下列的命令名稱欄位對應至所需的值導覽行為： ， ， ，或。To take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the currently active , set the `CommandName` property on the button or link button to the value of one of the following command-name fields that corresponds to the desired navigation behavior: , , , or . ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                         ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立基本的調查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每個控制項是一個個別的調查問題。Each control is a separate survey question. 當使用者按一下**上一步**在任何頁面上，按鈕屬性也會減少瀏覽至先前控制項。When the user clicks the **Previous** button on any page, the property is decremented to navigate to the previous control. 當使用者按一下**下一步**在任何頁面上，按鈕屬性會遞增，以瀏覽至下一個控制項。When the user clicks the **Next** button on any page, the property is incremented to navigate to the next control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewindexvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立基本控制項，其中包含三個控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a basic control that contains three controls. 使用者從清單方塊中選取的檢視是設為 作用中的檢視，並向使用者顯示。The view that the user selects from the list box is set to the active view and displayed to the user. 如需更詳細的範例控制項，請參閱本主題所提供的其他程式碼範例。For a more detailed example of the control, see the other code examples provided in this topic. [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example 2/VB/multiviewclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含三個控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. A控制項沒有任何的樣式屬性。A control does not have any style properties. 因此，每個控制項包含控制項，以允許要在設定的樣式控制項。Therefore, each control contains a control to allow styles to be set on the control. 第一次載入頁面時，`DefaultView`設為現用檢視表使用方法。The first time the page is loaded, the `DefaultView` is set as the active view using the method. 每個控制項包含連結按鈕，以允許使用者瀏覽至不同的檢視。Each control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views. [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example/VB/multiviewclass1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ActiveViewChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 當 控制項的現用 控制項在張貼至伺服器期間變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the active control of a control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時作用控制項中控制項送到伺服器的公佈間變更。The event is raised when the active control within a control changes between posts to the server. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 當現用檢視表的變更，訊息會顯示在頁面上的控制項。When the active view changes, a message is displayed in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int ActiveViewIndex { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ActiveViewIndex As Integer
public: virtual property int ActiveViewIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ActiveViewIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中現用 控制項的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the active control within a control.

value.span: 控制項中現用 控制項之以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the active control within a control.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示沒有任何檢視設為現用。

span.span: The default is -1, indicating that no view is set as active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定控制項中為現用檢視表的控制項。Use the property to set a control within a control as the active view. 您也可以使用這個屬性傳回的索引目前設為現用檢視表的控制項。You can also use this property to return the index of the control that is currently set as the active view. 索引控制項決定的順序來在其宣告內控制項。The index of a control is determined by the order in which it is declared within a control. 比方說，第一個控制項內宣告控制項具有索引 0。For example, the first control declared within a control has an index of 0. 只有一個控制項一次可定義為作用中控制項。Only one control at a time can be defined as active within a control. 控制項設為屬性會呈現給用戶端。The control that is set to the property will be rendered to the client. 如果屬性設定為，不存在於控制項，就會引發在執行階段。If the property is set to a that does not exist within the control, a is raised at run time. 如果屬性是空的控制項不會呈現給用戶端的任何內容。If the property is empty, the control does not render any content to the client. 您可以設定以宣告方式在開發階段或以程式設計方式在執行階段的屬性。You can set the property either declaratively at development time or programmatically at run time. 設定屬性以宣告方式定義時控制原因轉譯為用戶端第一次設定為使用中的檢視控制項稱為控制項。Setting the property declaratively when you define the control causes the control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the control is called. 設定屬性以程式設計的方式可讓應用程式，來判斷哪一個控制項呈現給用戶端在執行階段會根據使用者的身分識別或他們的喜好設定等準則。Setting the property programmatically allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or their preferences. 或者，您可以使用並方法來設定或取得使用中的檢視內控制項。Alternately, you can use the and methods to set or get the active view within the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立基本的調查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每個控制項是一個個別的調查問題。Each control is a separate survey question. 當使用者按一下**上一步**在任何頁面上，按鈕屬性也會減少瀏覽至先前控制項。When the user clicks the **Previous** button on any page, the property is decremented to navigate to the previous control. 當使用者按一下**下一步**在任何頁面上，按鈕屬性會遞增，以瀏覽至下一個控制項。When the user clicks the **Next** button on any page, the property is incremented to navigate to the next control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewindexvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的索引設定為小於 -1，或大於等於清單中項目的數目。

span.span: The specified index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出主題是否套用至 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to the control.

value.span: 如果要使用主題，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if themes are to be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供控制項。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 是否已啟用中所包含之控制項的佈景主題，屬性也會影響其集合。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its collection. 當屬性是`true`，應用程式的佈景主題目錄中搜尋要套用控制面板。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果任何特定的控制項外觀的佈景主題目錄中，將不套用的外觀。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 時屬性是`false`，則不會搜尋佈景主題目錄的內容屬性不會使用。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property are not used. 控制項可以覆寫設定其父控制項或包含頁面的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control or the containing page. 比方說，如果控制項有設為`false`，您可以選擇性地將佈景主題套用至個別內含控制項控制項，藉由設定屬性`true`上的個別子控制項。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to individual controls contained within the control by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.View GetActiveView() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 控制項中目前現用 控制項。

span.span: Returns the current active control within a control.

returns.span: 控制項，表示 控制項中的現用檢視表。

span.span: A control that represents the active view within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法傳回控制項中目前設為現用檢視表的控制項。Use this method to return the control within a control that is currently set as the active view. 這個方法會傳回控制項，並因此可以用來存取使用中檢視的屬性。This method returns a control and therefore can be used to access the properties of the active view. 例如，`MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID`傳回的值MultiView1 中目前的現用檢視表的屬性。For example, `MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID` returns the value of the property of the current active view in MultiView1. 或者，您可以使用屬性來取得或設定目前的現用檢視表中的以零為起始的索引控制項。Alternately, you can use the property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a control. 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，就可以存取這個屬性。This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含三個控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 當引發事件時，方法來傳回目前的現用檢視表，並顯示在頁面上的控制項。When the event is raised, the method is used to return the current active view and display it in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 屬性並非設定為 控制項中的有效 控制項。

span.span: The property is not set to a valid control within the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly NextViewCommandName As String

summary.span: 表示與 控制項中要顯示的下一個 控制項關聯的命令名稱。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with the next control to display in a control.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示 「 NextView"命令名稱。Use the field to represent the "NextView" command name. 您可以使用這個欄位的值，以善用控制項的自動更新使用中的控制項。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控制項包含瀏覽至先前的控制項，您可以設定屬性設為值的欄位，也就是 「 NextView"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the previous , you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "NextView". 這會導致自動遞減的值控制屬性按一下按鈕時。This causes the control to automatically decrement the value of the property when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立基本的調查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每個控制項是一個個別的調查問題。Each control is a separate survey question. 並欄位用來提供自動巡覽的上一個和下一步問卷中的控制項。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnActiveViewChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnActiveViewChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnActiveViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnActiveViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時作用控制項中發佈至伺服器期間變更的控制項，而且您可以提供自訂處理常式，此事件。The event is raised when the active control within a control changes between posts to the server, and you can provide a custom handler for this event. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[＜How to：使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 當現用檢視表的變更，訊息會顯示在頁面上的控制項。When the active view changes, a message is displayed in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

returns.span: 如果事件已取消，則為 ，否則為 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項包含引發事件的控制項。A control contains controls that raise events. 這個方法會覆寫基底實作處理之間的巡覽控制項。This method overrides the base implementation to handle navigation between controls.

exception.span: 控制項找不到 的 屬性中指定的 。

span.span: The control cannot find the specified in the property of .

exception.span: 的 屬性無法剖析為整數。

span.span: The property of cannot be parsed as an integer.

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個方法，以通知控制項必須執行才能建立並設定執行個體的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, a control must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在這個階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 您無法存取其他伺服器控制項時呼叫這個方法時，即使它是子網域或此控制項的父代。You cannot access another server control when this method is called, even if it is a child or parent of this control. 其他伺服器控制項不一定是已建立並準備好進行存取。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly PreviousViewCommandName As String

summary.span: 表示與 控制項中要顯示的上一個 控制項關聯的命令名稱。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with the previous control to display in a control.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示 「 PrevView"命令名稱。Use the field to represent the "PrevView" command name. 您可以使用這個欄位的值，以善用控制項的自動更新使用中的控制項。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 比方說，如果控制項包含巡覽至下一個控制項，您可以設定屬性設為值的欄位，也就是 「 PrevView"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the next , you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "PrevView". 這會導致控制自動遞增的值屬性按一下按鈕時。This causes the control to automatically increment the value of the property when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立基本的調查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每個控制項是一個個別的調查問題。Each control is a separate survey question. 並欄位用來提供自動巡覽的上一個和下一步問卷中的控制項。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: ，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 將 控制項內容寫入指定的 物件，以便在用戶端顯示。

span.span: Writes the control content to the specified object, for display on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂類別時，方法主要由控制項開發人員用控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 方法會寫入使用所提供的用戶端中的現用檢視表的呈現的內容。The method writes the rendered content of the active view to the client using the supplied . 您可以在設定使用中的檢視使用控制方法或屬性。You can set the active view in a control using the method or the property. 您可以判斷哪一項中的控制項集合會是作用中的檢視中，如果使用的任何方法或屬性。You can determine which one of the controls in the collection is the active view, if any, by using the method or the property. 如果已設定使用中的檢視控制，請使用控制項用來呈現該檢視及其子控制項的內容。If an active view is set for the control, the active control is used to render content for that view and its child controls. 如果未設定作用中的檢視控制項，沒有內容呈現至。If an active view is not set for the control, no content is rendered to the .

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

summary.span: 儲存 控制項的目前狀態。

An that represents the state of the control.

returns.span: 如果沒有與 控制項相關的狀態，這個方法就會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns .

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetActiveView(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.View view) cil managed

param.name: view
param.span: 要在 控制項中設為現用檢視表的 控制項。

span.span: A control to set as the active view within a control.

summary.span: 將指定的 控制項設為 控制項中的現用檢視表。

span.span: Sets the specified control to the active view within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來設定控制項中為現用檢視表的控制項。Use this method to set a control within a control as the active view. 只有一個控制項一次可定義為作用中控制項。Only one control at a time can be defined as active within a control. 會設定為使用中的檢視在用戶端呈現的控制項。The control that is set as the active view is rendered to the client. 如果內不存在的控制項控制項設定為使用中、 在執行階段引發例外狀況。If a control that does not exist within the control is set as active, an exception is raised at run time. 如果沒有控制項設定為使用中的檢視，控制項不會呈現給用戶端的任何內容。If no control is set as the active view, the control does not render any content to the client. 使用方法來以程式設計方式設定 使用中的檢視可讓應用程式，來判斷哪一個控制項呈現給用戶端在執行階段會根據使用者的身分識別和喜好設定等準則。Using the method to programmatically set the active view allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity and preferences. 或者，您可以使用屬性來取得或設定目前的現用檢視表中的以零為起始的索引控制項。Alternately, you can use the property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a control. 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，就可以存取這個屬性。This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含三個控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 第一次載入頁面時，`DefaultView`設為現用檢視表使用方法。The first time the page is loaded, the `DefaultView` is set as the active view using the method. 每個控制項包含連結按鈕，以允許使用者瀏覽至不同的檢視。Each control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example/VB/multiviewclass1vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的 參數值不包含在 控制項中。

span.span: The specified parameter value was not contained in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewByIDCommandName As String

summary.span: 根據指定的 識別碼而定，表示與變更 控制項中現用 控制項關聯的命令名稱。此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with changing the active control in a control, based on a specified id. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示 「 SwitchViewByID"命令名稱。Use the field to represent the "SwitchViewByID" command name. 您可以使用這個欄位的值，以善用控制項的自動更新使用中的控制項。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控制項包含瀏覽至第一個控制項按一下時，您可以設定屬性設為值的欄位，也就是 「 SwitchViewByID"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the first when clicked, you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "SwitchViewByID". 設定屬性的第一個識別碼在控制項，例如"Page1"。Set the property to the ID of the first in the control, such as "Page1". 這會導致控制項以自動設定為作用中的 "Page1"按下按鈕。This causes the control to automatically set "Page1" as the active when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立基本的調查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每個控制項是一個個別的調查問題。Each control is a separate survey question. 並欄位用來提供自動巡覽的上一個和下一步問卷中的控制項。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. 如果使用者按一下**考問卷調查**中最後一個按鈕的調查，欄位"Page1 」 的命令引數以及用來將使用者重新導向回到第一個的問卷。If the user clicks the **Retake Survey** button in the last of the survey, the field is used along with a command argument of "Page1" to redirect the user back to the first of the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: MultiView 和 View Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewByIndexCommandName As String

summary.span: 根據指定的 索引而定，表示與變更 控制項中現用 控制項關聯的命令名稱。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with changing the active control in a control based on a specified index.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示 「 SwitchViewByIndex"命令名稱。Use the field to represent the "SwitchViewByIndex" command name. 您可以使用這個欄位的值，以善用控制項的自動更新使用中的控制項。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控制項包含瀏覽至第一個控制項按一下時，您可以設定屬性設為值的欄位，也就是 「 SwitchViewByIndex"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the first when clicked, you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "SwitchViewByIndex". 設定屬性的第一個索引在控制項，也就是 0。Set the property to the index of the first in the control, which is 0. 這會導致自動設定控制屬性設為 0，按一下按鈕時。This causes the control to automatically set the property to 0 when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立基本的調查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每個控制項是一個個別的調查問題。Each control is a separate survey question. 並欄位用來提供自動巡覽的上一個和下一步問卷中的控制項。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. 如果使用者按一下**考問卷**中最後一個按鈕的調查，調查欄位做為命令引數為 0 以及將使用者重新導向回到第一個的問卷。If the user clicks the **Retake Survey** button in the last of the survey, the field is used along with a command argument of 0 to redirect the user back to the first of the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName/CS/multiview.switchviewbyindexcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName/VB/multiview.switchviewbyindexcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Views As ViewCollection

summary.span: 取得 控制項中 控制項的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls in the control.

value.span: ，表示 控制項中 控制項的集合。

span.span: A that represents a collection of controls within a control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式管理中的控制項控制項。Use this property to programmatically manage the controls in a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式新增控制項新增至控制項。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add controls to a control. 在每個建立控制項時，`MultiView.Views.Add()`語法用來新增若要控制集合控制項。After each control is created, the `MultiView.Views.Add()` syntax is used to add the control to the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.Views Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.Views Example/VB/multiviewviewsvb.aspx#1)]
